content.text:
Works like the one (<image 1>) shown from Micronesia utilized abstract geometric lines and shapes because they functioned to record

A. constellations and heavenly bodies
B. clan locations and boundary lines
C. royal lineage and family births
D. ocean currents and landforms

B. clan locations and boundary lines

The image shows a geometrically structured framework that appears to be used for recording clan locations and boundary lines. This type of structure is common in many cultures, particularly in Micronesian societies, where such frameworks are used to document and maintain clan boundaries and locations.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
